title: Modernizing Urban Transit
challenge: The city's public transport system was inefficient, with outdated routes causing long commute times and high operational costs.
solution: We developed a custom web GIS portal that integrated real-time traffic data, ridership numbers, and demographic information to model and simulate new route scenarios instantly.
impact: Reduced average commute times by 15% and cut operational costs by 10%.

title: Revolutionizing Farming with UAVs
challenge: The client needed to optimise the use of fertilisers and water across 50,000 hectares of variable terrain.
solution: We deployed UAVs to capture high-resolution multispectral imagery. This data was processed to create detailed maps of crop health, allowing for precise, variable-rate application of resources.
impact: Boosted crop yields by 20% and reduced fertiliser usage by 25%.
